highlights: Provide a safe way for developers to deploy cloud native micro services in containerized production environments without affecting real users.
Build a fast and easy-to-use query service for large scale event data.
Launch a platform to measure service availability, uptime, outages and to run blameless postmortems.
Create tactical and strategic solutions to allow for efficient management of Ingress controller configurations across Openshift K8s clusters.
Improve service reliability and application SLOs by leveraging to manage modernized apps deployed as microservices.
Instrumental in rolling out Mattermost (persistent chat software) to help in the build out of an enterprise Chatops platform.
